dc_title_s: Carte du Mexique et de la Floridedes terres angloises et des Isles Antilles du cours et des environs de la Rivière de la Mississipi
dc_description_s: 1 color map; Scale: 1:9,504,000; 150 miles to 1 inch; C. Simonneau fecit; For information concerning this map and its various revised ed. consult Phillips, Philip Lee. List of geographical atlases in Library of Congress. Scale approximately 1:9,080,000 (W 112°39ʹ00ʺ--W 56°34ʹ00ʺ/N 49°15ʹ00ʺ--N 6°28ʹ00ʺ).
